function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate disinfection with UVC due to inadequate depth of penetration","Impact":"Increased risk of bacteria and virus transmission, leading to potential outbreaks of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Use additional measures such as physical disinfection to complement UVC disinfection","Technologies":"Physical disinfection methods such as incineration can be used to eliminate residual pathogens","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and visitors at the hospital","Owner":"Hospital management and infection control department"},{"Description":"Inappropriate selection of disinfection technologies for hospital waste","Impact":"Risk of inadequate disinfection, leading to potential exposure to infectious materials and contaminants","Mitigation":"Consider factors such as amount of waste, costs, maintenance, and types of waste when selecting disinfection technologies","Technologies":"Incineration, chemical disinfection, and physical disinfection methods","People":"Hospital staff, waste management personnel, and individuals handling hospital waste","Owner":"Hospital management and waste management department"}]}
